item.title: 2021-04-06 - Tiger Jenkins Guide
item.description: 2021-04-06 - Tiger Jenkins Guide go to main wiki jenkins tiger-user-branches go to build with parameters choose my branch

item.title: How to Use Creduce by Ed
item.description: As for steps on how to use Creduce: Take a copy of the failing test in a temporary directory: 1 2 3 mkdir -p <temporary_dir> cp <failing_test.

item.title: Tiger
item.description: Cheatsheet Notes 1 2 3 4 5 table without ID file.link as "Link", file.ctime as "Created Time" from #work/tiger WHERE type = "cheatsheet" sort file.

item.title: Tiger - Sync-up
item.description: Paolo been working on testing. He has TIGER/toolchain/gcc-test-scan, inside he has folders with errors for practicality. First take the directories from Jenkins and run the script.

item.title: Tiger Optimisation (memset/memcpy)
item.description: Optimising expansion of memcpy/memset using hardware loops Currently memcpy and memset get expanded to a list of stores and loads for small sized values.

item.title: Titan Simulator Meeting
item.description: The source code is in the LLVM project: BSCSimulator.cpp. Central to this is the include file: BSCGenRegisterInfo.
